gurmukhi: jobnwNq AMqk pd piRQm aucwrIAY ] cwr bwr niRp Sbd qvn pr fwrIAY ] Air kih nwm qupk ky cqur pCwnIAY ] ho CMd cOpeI mwih inSMk bKwnIAY ]1281]
transliteration: Jabnaant Antak Pad Pritham Oucdareeai|| Chaar Baar Nrip Shabad Tavan Par Dareeai|| Ar(i) Kah(i) Naam Toupak Ke Chatur Pachhaadeeai|| Ho Chhand Chaoupaimaah(i) Nishank Bakhaaneeai||1281||
translation: Saying the word “Yovnaantak”, add the word “Nrip” four times and then adding the word “ari” and recognize the names of Tupak, use them in CHaupai stanza.1281.

gurmukhi: qrn dMq Ar Sbd su muK qy BwKIAY ] cqur bwr niRp Sbd qvn ky rwKIAY ] skl qupk ky nwm jwn ijX lIjIAY ] ho suDin dohrw mwih infr huie dIjIAY ]1282]
transliteration: Taran Dant Ar Shabad Su Moukh Te Bhaakheeai|| Chatur Baar Nrip Shabad Tavan Ke Rakheeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Jaan Jiya Leejeeai|| Ho Sudhan(i) Dohraa Maah(i) Nidar Maah(i) Nidar Hue Deejeeai||1282||
translation: Saying the word “Tarundant ari,” add the word “Nrip” four times and in this way, use th names of Tupak consciously in Dohra stanza.1282.

gurmukhi: jobnwir Air pd ko Awid bKwnIAY ] cr bwr niRp Sbd qvn ky TwnIAY ] S`qRu ko AMq qvn ky BwKIAY ] ho skl qupk ky nwm cqur icq rwKIAY ]1283]
transliteration: Jobadaar(i) Ar(i) Pad Ko Aadh Bakhaaneeai|| Chaar Baar Nrip Shabad Tavan Ke Thaaneeai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Ant Tavan Ke Bhaakheeai|| Ho Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Chatur Chit Raakheeai||1283||
translation: Saying the words “Yovnaari ari”, add the word “Nrip” four times and uttering the word “Shatur” at the end know all the names of Tupak.1283.

gurmukhi: cqurQvsQw Air pd Awid bKwnIAY ] cqur bwr niRp Sbd qvn ky TwnIAY ] S`qRu Sbd ko AMq su bhur bKwn kY ] ho skl qupk ky nwm lIjIAY jwn kY ]1284]
transliteration: Chaturthavasthaa Ar(i) Pad Aadh Bakhaaneeai|| Chatur Baar Nrip Shabad Tavan Ke Thaaneeai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Ant Bahur Bakhaan Kai|| Ho Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Leejeeai Jaan Kai||1284||
translation: Saying the word “Chaturath avastha ari”, add the word “Nrip” four times and then uttering the word “Shatru” at the end know all the names of Tupak.1284.

gurmukhi: jmpwsI ky nwmn Awid aucwrIAY ] hr kih pd bwr cwr Puin fwrIAY ] su kib qupk ky nwm BwK Air lIjIAY ] ho suDin svYXw mwNJ infr huie dIjIAY ]1285]
transliteration: Jampaasike Naamanndaadh Oucdareeai|| Har Kah(i) Nrip Pad Baar Chaar Phoun(i)dareeai|| Su Kabi Toupak Ke Naam Bhaakh Ar(i) Leejeeai|| Ho Sudhan(i) Sawaiyaa Maanjh Nidar Hue Deejeeai||1285||
translation: Uttering firstly the names of the noose of Yama, add the word “Har” and hen the word “Nrip” four times and in this way, O good poet; know the names of Tupak and use them consciously in Swayyas.1285.

gurmukhi: Air blwir Air Awid aucwrn kIjIAY ] cwr bwr piq Sbd qvn ky dIjIAY ] skl qupk ky nwm jwn ijX lIjIAih ] ho CMd kuMfrIAw mwih SMk qij dIjIAih ]1286]
transliteration: Ar(i) Badaar(i) Ar(i) Aadh Ouchaaran Keejeeai|| Chaar Baar Pat(i) Shabad Tavan Ke Deejeeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Jaan Jiya Leejeeaih|| Ho Chhand Koundareeaa Maah(i) Shank Taj(i) Deejeeaih||1286
translation: Saying firstly the words “Aribalaari ari”, add the word “Pati” four times and know all the names of Tupak for using them in Kundaryaa stanza.1286.

gurmukhi: Awrjwr Air Awid aucwrn kIjIAY ] cwr bwr niRp pd ko bhur BxIjIAY ] Air kih nwm qupk ky cqur pCwnIAY ] ho CMd JUlnw mwih inSMk bKwnIAY ]1287]
transliteration: Aarjaar Ar(i) Aadh Ouchaaran Keejeeai|| Chaar Baar Nrip Pad Ko Bahur Bhaneejeeai|| Ar(i) Kah(i) Naam Toupak Ke Chatur Pachhaadeeai|| Ho Chhand Jhoolanaa Maah(i) Nishank Bakhaaneeai||1287||
translation: Saying firstly the words “Aarjaar ari”. Add the word “Nrip” four times and uttering the word “ari”, recognize all the names of Tupak for using them in Jhoolnaa stanza.1287.

gurmukhi: dyhbwsI Ar hr pd Awid BnIjIAY ] cwr bwr niRp Sbd su bhur khIjIAY ] Air kih nwm qupk ky cqur ibcwrIAY ] ho CMd AiVl ky mwNih infr kih fwrIAY ]1288]
transliteration: Dehbaasiar Har Aadh Bhaneejeeai|| Chaar Baar Nrip Shabad Su Bahur Kaheejeeai|| Ar(i) Kah(i) Naam Toupak Ke Chatur Bicdareeai|| Ho Chhand Adil Ke Maanh(i) Nidar Kah(i) Dareeai||1288||
translation: Saying firstly the words “Dehvaasi ari Har”, and uttering the word “Nrip” four times, add the word “ari” and considering the names of Tupak, use them fearlessly in Aril stanza.1288.

gurmukhi: bpubwsI Air Ar Sbdwid bKwnIAY ] cwr bwr niRp Sbd qvn ky TwnIAY ] Air kih nwm qupk ky cqur pCwnIAY ] ho CMd cMcrIAw mwih inSMk pRmwnIAY ]1289]
transliteration: Bapoubaasiar(i) Su Shabadaadh Bakhaaneeai|| Chaar Baar Nrip Shabad Tavan Ke Thaaneeai|| Ar(i) Kah(i) Naam Toupak Ke Chatur Pachaaneeai|| Ho Channddareeaa Mah(i) Neeshank Pramaaneeai||1289||
translation: Saying firstly the words “Vapuvaasi ari”, add the word “Nrip” four times and uttering the word “ari” know the names of Tupak for using them in CHandchariyaa stanza.1289.

gurmukhi: qnbwsI Ar hr ko Awid bKwn kY ] cwr bwr niRp Sbd qvn ky Twn kY ] Air kih nwm qupk ky cqur pCwnIAY ] ho krhu aucwrn qhwN jhwN ijX jwnIAY ]1290]
transliteration: Tanbaasiar Hark Ko Aadh Bakhaan Kai|| Chaar Baar Nrip Shabad Tavan Ke Thaan Kai|| Ar(i) Kah(i) Naam Toupak Ke Chatur Pachhaadeeai|| Hodaroh Ouchaaran Tahaan Jahaan Jiya Jaaneeai||1290||
translation: Saying firstly the words “Tanvaasi ari Har”, add the word “:Nrip four times and uttering the word “ari” recognize cleverly the names of Tupak for using them as desired.1290.

gurmukhi: Asur Sbd ko Awid aucwrn kIjIAY ] ipq kih niRp pd AMq qvn ky dIjIAY ] Air kih nwm qupk ky cqur pCwnIAY ] ho infr bKwno qhwN jhwN ijX jwnIAY ]1291]
transliteration: Asur Shabad Ko Aadh Ouchaaran Keejeeai|| Pit Kah(i) Nrip Pad Ant Tavan Ke Deejeeai|| Ar(i) Kah(i) Naam Toupak Ke Chatur Pachhaadeeai|| Ho Nidar Bakhaano Tahaan Jahaan Jiya Jaaneeai||1291||
translation: Saying firsly the word “Asur”, add the word “Pit” and then the word “Nrip” at the end and then uttering the word “Nrip” at the end and then uttering the word “ari” recognize the names of Tupak for using them as desired.1291.

gurmukhi: rwCswir pd muK qy Awid bKwnIAhu ] cwr bwr piq Sbd qvn ky TwnIAhu ] Air kih nwm qupk ky icq mY jwn lY ] ho jo pUCY quih Awie inSMk bqwie dY ]1292]
transliteration: Raachhdaar(i) Pad Moukh Te Aadh Bakhaaneeauh|| Chaar Baar Pat(i) Shabad Tavan Ke Thaaneeauh|| Ar(i) Kah(i) Naam Toupak Ke Chit Mai Jaan Lai|| Ho Jo Poochhai Tuhe Aae Nishank Bataai Dai||1292||
translation: Saying the word “Raakshsaari”, add the word “Pati” four tiems and then uttering the word “ari” at the end, know the names of Tupak for conveying to all unhesitatingly.1292.

gurmukhi: dwnvwir pd muK qy suGir piRQm aucr ] cwr bwr niRp Sbd qvn ky AMq Dr ] Air kih nwm qupk ky cqur pCwn lY ] ho su kib sBw ky mwNJ infr huie BwK dY ]1293]
transliteration: Daandaar(i) Pad Moukh Te Soughar(i) Pritham Ouchar|| Chaar Baar Nrip Shabad Tavan Ke Ant Dhar|| Ar(i) Kah(i) Naam Toupak Ke Chatur Pachhaad Lai|| Ho Su Kabi Sabhaa Ke Maanjh Nidar Hue Bhaakh Dai||1293
translation: Saying firstly the word “Daanvaari”, add the word “Nrip” four times and then adding the word “ari”, know the name of Tupak for uttering them fearlessly.1293.

gurmukhi: Amrwrdn Ar Awid su kib aucwr kY ] qIn bwr niRp Sbd AMq iqh fwr kY ] Ar kih nwm qupk ky skl suDwr lY ] ho pVXo chq iqh nr ko qurq isKwie dY ]1294]
transliteration: Amraardan Ar Aadh Su Kabi Ouchaar Kai|| Teen Baar Nrip Shabad Ant Tih Daar Kai|| Ar Kah(i) Naam Toupak Ke Sakal Sudhaar Lai|| Ho Padyo Chahat Tih Nar Ko Turat Sikhaae Dai||1294||
translation: Saying firstly the words “Amraardan ari” and adding the word “Nrip” three times at the end then uttering the word “ari”, know all the names of Tupak for instructing all.1294.
